gurmukhi: ਅਦੇਖ ਭੇਖ ਕੇ ਬਿਨਾ ਸੁ ਕਰਮ ਭਰਮ ਜਾਨੀਅੈ ॥੩॥੧੦੬॥
transliteration: Adekh Bhekh Ke Binaa Su Karam Bharam Jaaneeai||3||106||
translation: In the absence of the pure Karmas related to the Invisible Lord, all the other Karmas he considered as illusion and hyposcrisy.3.106.

gurmukhi: ਅਜਾਤ ਪਾਤ ਅਮਾਤ ਤਾਤ ਅਜਾਤ ਸਿੱਧ ਹੈ ਸਦਾ ॥
transliteration: Ajaat Paat Amaat Taat Ajaat Siddh Hai Sadaa||
translation: He is without caste and lineage, without mother and father; He is Unborn and ever perfect.

gurmukhi: ਅਸਤ੍ਰ ਮਿਤ੍ਰ ਪੁਤ੍ਰ ਪੳੁਤ੍ਰ ਜਤ੍ਰ ਤਤ੍ਰ ਸਰਬ ਦਾ ॥
transliteration: Astra Mitra Poutra Paoutra Jatra Tatra Sarab Daa||
translation: He is without enemy and friend, without son and grandson and He is always everywhere.

gurmukhi: ਅਖੰਡ ਮੰਡ ਚੰਡ ੳੁਦੰਡ ਅਖੰਡ ਖੰਡ ਭਾਖੀਅੈ ॥
translation: He is Supremely Glorious and is called the crusher and breaker of the Unbreakable.

gurmukhi: ਨ ਰੂਪ ਰੰਗ ਰੇਖ ਅਲੇਖ ਭੇਖ ਮੈ ਨ ਰਾਖੀਅੈ ॥੪॥੧੦੭॥
transliteration: Na Roop Ran Rekh Alekh Bhekh Main A Raakheeai||4||107||
translation: He cannot be placed in the garb of form, colour, mark and calculation.4.107.

gurmukhi: ਅਨੰਤ ਤੀਰਥ ਅਾਦਿ ਅਾਸਨਾਦਿ ਨਾਰਦ ਅਾਸਨੰ ॥
transliteration: Anant Teerath Aadh Aasanaadh Naarad Aasanan||
translation: Bathing at innumerable pilgrim-stations etc., adopting various postures etc., following the discipline of worship according to Narad Pancharatra;

gurmukhi: ਬੈਰਾਗ ਅੳੁ ਸੰਨਿਅਾਸ ਅੳੁ ਅਨਾਦਿ ਜੋਗ ਪ੍ਰਾਸਨੰ ॥
transliteration: Bairaag Au Sanniaas Au Anaadh Jog Praasanan||
translation: Adoption of Vairagya (monasticism and asceticlism) and Sannyas (renunciation) and observing yogic discipline of olden times:

gurmukhi: ਅਨਾਦਿ ਤੀਰਥ ਸੰਜਮਾਦਿ ਬਰਤ ਨੇਮ ਪੇਖੀਅੈ ॥
transliteration: Anaadh Teerath Sanjamaadh Barat Nem Pekheeai||
translation: Visiting ancient pilgrim-stations and observing restraints etc., fasts and other rules;

gurmukhi: ਅਨਾਦਿ ਅਗਾਧਿ ਕੇ ਬਿਨਾ ਸਮੱਸਤ ਭਰਮ ਲੇਖੀਅੈ ॥੫॥੧੦੮॥
transliteration: Anaadh Agaddh(i) Ke Binaa Samast Bharam Lekheeai||5||108||
translation: Without the Beginningless and Unfathomable Lord, all the above Karmas be considered as illusion.5.108.

gurmukhi: ਦੲਿਅਾਦਿ ਅਾਦਿ ਧਰਮੰ ॥ ਸੰਨਿਅਾਸ ਅਾਦਿ ਕਰਮੰ ॥
transliteration: Daiaadh Aadh Dharamannd|| Sanniaas Aadh Karamaan||
translation: The religious discipline like Mercy etc., the Karmas like Sannyas (renunciation) etc.,

gurmukhi: ਗਜਾਦਿ ਅਾਦਿ ਦਾਨੰ ॥ ਹਯਾਦਿ ਅਾਦਿ ਥਾਨੰ ॥੧॥੧੦੯॥
transliteration: Gadaadh Aadh Daanan|| Hayaadh Aadh Thaanan||1||109||
translation: The Charities of elephants etc., the places of sacrifice of horses etc.,1.109.

gurmukhi: ਸੁਵਰਨ ਅਾਦਿ ਦਾਨੰ ॥ ਸਮੁੰਦ੍ਰ ਅਾਦਿ ੲਿਸਨਾਨੰ ॥
transliteration: Suvaran Aadh Daanan|| Samounndra Aadh Isnaanan||
translation: The charities like gold etc., the bath in the sea etc.,

gurmukhi: ਬਿਸੁਵਾਦਿ ਅਾਦਿ ਭਰਮੰ ॥ ਬਿਰਕਤਾਦਿ ਅਾਦਿ ਕਰਮੰ ॥੨॥੧੧੦॥
transliteration: Bisuvaadh Aadh Bharamannd|| Birakataad Aadh Karamannd||2||110||
translation: Wanderings in the universe etc., the works of austerities etc.,2.110.
